name: P!NG
description:
I wanted to see if I can make a game without following a tutorial or course. Logically, I chose to make the first videogame ever, Pong.

The first player to earn five points wins the game, while the ball slowly gains speed and bounces more erratically.

Controls:

  • Player 1: W,S
  • Player 2: Arrow Keys (up, down)
  • Pause: esc

Although it's meant to be played by two players, I've found it's acutally very entretaining to see how much you can last on your own, controlling both players.

Enjoy!
